safety_requirements.description_cn: 高脚椅在正常使用和倾斜10°情况下不得倾倒
safety_requirements.description_en: High chair must not tip over during normal use and 10° tilt test

safety_requirements.description_cn: 必须配备有效的约束装置，防止儿童滑落
safety_requirements.description_en: Must be equipped with effective restraint system to prevent child from falling

safety_requirements.description_cn: 托盘必须可靠锁定，使用力至少50N才能打开
safety_requirements.description_en: Tray must be securely locked, requiring at least 50N force to open

safety_requirements.description_cn: 活动部件之间的间隙不得大于5mm或小于12mm
safety_requirements.description_en: Gap between moving parts must not be >5mm or <12mm

safety_requirements.description_cn: 所有边缘必须圆角处理，不得有尖锐突起
safety_requirements.description_en: All edges must be rounded, no sharp projections

safety_requirements.description_cn: 材料必须符合GB 6675玩具安全标准
safety_requirements.description_en: Materials must comply with GB 6675 toy safety standards

safety_requirements.description_cn: 必须承受正常使用和异常使用下的载荷
safety_requirements.description_en: Must withstand loads during normal and abnormal use

safety_requirements.description_cn: 必须有清晰的使用说明和安全警示标识
safety_requirements.description_en: Must have clear usage instructions and safety warning labels

safety_features.name_cn: 三点式或五点式安全带

ergonomic_requirements.description_cn: 座椅应符合儿童身体曲线，提供良好支撑
ergonomic_requirements.description_en: Seat should conform to child's body curve, provide good support

ergonomic_requirements.description_cn: 座椅应支持一定角度调节，适应不同使用场景
ergonomic_requirements.description_en: Seat should support angle adjustment for different usage scenarios

ergonomic_requirements.description_cn: 应配备可调节足托，避免儿童双脚悬空
ergonomic_requirements.description_en: Should be equipped with adjustable footrest to avoid dangling feet

ergonomic_requirements.description_cn: 靠背应提供良好的背部支撑，保护脊椎
ergonomic_requirements.description_en: Backrest should provide good support for spine protection
